languages.text: "Cамопровозглашенный капитан Вальц, Пасынок Империума, как и все здесь. Живая десятина, брошенная на произвол судьбы. И ветеран мира смерти, по ошибке попавший к рекрутам".
"Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."
languages.original_text: "Cамопровозглашенный капитан Вальц, Пасынок Империума, как и все здесь. Живая десятина, брошенная на произвол судьбы. И ветеран мира смерти, по ошибке попавший к рекрутам".

traits.locale_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to their fate. And a Death World veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."
"Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to their fate. And a Death World veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

"Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

languages.text: «El autoproclamado capitán Walz, un hijastro del Imperium, al igual que todos los que estamos aquí. Un diezmo viviente abandonado a su suerte y un veterano de un mundo letal que acabó entre los reclutas por error».
languages.original_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

traits.locale_text: «El autoproclamado capitán Walz, un hijastro del Imperium, al igual que todos los que estamos aquí. Un diezmo viviente abandonado a su suerte y un veterano de un mundo letal que acabó entre los reclutas por error».

languages.text: “我是沃尔茨队长，帝国的继子。这里的所有人，都是帝国的继子。我是被命运遗弃的什一税成员，也是来自死亡世界的老兵，被错误地运到了新兵之中。”
languages.original_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

traits.locale_text: “我是沃尔茨队长，帝国的继子。这里的所有人，都是帝国的继子。我是被命运遗弃的什一税成员，也是来自死亡世界的老兵，被错误地运到了新兵之中。”

languages.text: 「自称キャプテン・ワルツ、俺たちが皆ここにいるように帝国の連れ子。見殺しにされた生きている租税だ。そして、誤って新兵に紛れ込んでしまった死地惑星の兵士でもある」
languages.original_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「自称キャプテン・ワルツ、俺たちが皆ここにいるように帝国の連れ子。見殺しにされた生きている租税だ。そして、誤って新兵に紛れ込んでしまった死地惑星の兵士でもある」

languages.text: « Walz, capitaine autoproclamé et enfant de l'Imperium, comme nous tous ici. Un pauvre tribut de la dîme abandonné à son triste sort. Et le vétéran d'un monde hostile ayant fini par erreur parmi les recrues. »
languages.original_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Walz, capitaine autoproclamé et enfant de l'Imperium, comme nous tous ici. Un pauvre tribut de la dîme abandonné à son triste sort. Et le vétéran d'un monde hostile ayant fini par erreur parmi les recrues. »

languages.text: "Sözde Kaptan Walz, buradaki herkes gibi İmparatorluk'un Üvey Evladı. Kaderine terk edilmiş bir canlı aşar... Yanlışlıkla acemilerin arasına düşmüş bir ölüm dünyası gazisi."
languages.original_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Sözde Kaptan Walz, buradaki herkes gibi İmparatorluk'un Üvey Evladı. Kaderine terk edilmiş bir canlı aşar... Yanlışlıkla acemilerin arasına düşmüş bir ölüm dünyası gazisi."

languages.text: "Selbsternannter Captain Wirtz, ein Stiefkind des Imperiums, wie wir alle hier. Ein lebender, seinem Schicksal überlassener, Zehnt. Und ein Veteran einer toten Welt, der irrtümlich unter Rekruten gelandet ist."
languages.original_text: "Self-proclaimed Captain Walz, a Stepchild of the Imperium, as we all are here. A living tithe abandoned to his fate. And a death world veteran who ended up among recruits by mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Selbsternannter Captain Wirtz, ein Stiefkind des Imperiums, wie wir alle hier. Ein lebender, seinem Schicksal überlassener, Zehnt. Und ein Veteran einer toten Welt, der irrtümlich unter Rekruten gelandet ist."
